what: Make queries to the Chat API
title: Make queries to the Chat API
text: function takes data frame study details, constructs prompt study, sends OpenAI’s GPT-3.5-turbo model response. function returns tibble original study details model’s response.

title: Make queries to the Chat API
text: data: data frame containing study details. row represent study must ‘title’ ‘abstract’ columns. prompt: string prepended study details form prompt model. model: string specifying model use. Default “gpt-3.5-turbo”.

title: Make queries to the Chat API
text: tibble original study details model’s response.

title: Make queries to the Chat API
text: can install development version Chat GitHub :

title: Make queries to the Chat API
code: prompt <- "Is this study about a Functional Family Therapy (FFT) intervention?" loaded_objects <- load("./data/filges2015_dat_modified.rda") data <- get(loaded_objects) chat(data, prompt, model = "gpt-3.5-turbo")  A tibble: 6 × 3    Title                                     StudyID decision_gpt    <chr>                                     <chr>   <chr>         1 Estimating and communicating prognosis i… 1       "No, this s…  2 Self-Directed Behavioral Family Interven… 2       "No, this s…  3 Frequency domain source localization sho… 3       "No, this s…  4 A Review of: 'Kearney, C. A. (2010). Hel… 4       "No, this s…  5 Topographic differences in the adolescen… 5       "No, this s…  6 BOOK REVIEW                               6       "No, this s…

what: Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
title: Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
text: function takes data frame study details, constructs prompt study, sends OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model response. function returns tibble original study details model's response.

title: Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
text: data data frame containing study details. row represent study must 'title' 'abstract' columns. prompt string prepended study details form prompt model. model string specifying model use. Default "gpt-3.5-turbo".

title: Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
text: tibble original study details model's response.

title: Chat with OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo model — chat
code: if (FALSE) { prompt <- "Is this study about a Functional Family Therapy (FFT) intervention?" loaded_objects <- load("./data/filges2015_dat_modified.rda") data <- get(loaded_objects) chat(data, prompt) }

title: Set API Key — set_api_key
text: function sets API key CHATGPT_KEY environment variable. environment variable set, prompts user enter API key.

title: Set API Key — set_api_key
text: function first checks "CHATGPT_KEY" environment variable set. set, prompts user enter value "CHATGPT_KEY" sets environment variable entered value.

title: Set API Key — set_api_key
code: set_api_key() #> Please enter the value for CHATGPT_KEY: #> Error in Sys.setenv(CHATGPT_KEY = CHATGPT_KEY): 'names' and 'val' are of different lengths
